name: Evolution Parallel
description:
Well it's an idea we had, just not enough time to implement everything as this was a Ludum Dare 35 submissions for the jam, created by me, and my friends. Game is not complete, not really even a game but the art and animations was pretty good so I decided to include it anyway! Enjoy :)

Controls on Main Menu: Up/Down Arrows, Enter = Select
Controls ingame: Up/Down/Left/Right Arrows, Q/W/E/R - Changes between forms.
